ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:

> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> I have a dilemma :) Last night I purchased (for 200 plat) an Obsidian Shard
> (6 Dam/25 delay, Obsidian Shatter effect). I had thought I had read the the
> OS effect did 75 damage, but I only proc'd once last night for 30. The
> effect is very cool.
>
> Now the dilemma. A rogue offered me a Polished Granite Tomahawk and a
> Dragoon Dirk for the Shard. Now personally I am leaning toward keeping the
> Shard, but I know I could barter the PGT into either a good bit of plat
> (saving for steel plate) or a nice item or two. Any and all advise is
> welcome....

Hi fellow Karanan bard,

Don't know if this is too late or not. In terms of weapons, the shard and the
tomahawk are roughly equal. The shard is a better weapon, barely, but the
tomahawk's effect is slightly better I think. The dirk is a great weapon, but
very common. Monetarily, if you made that trade, you would come out ahead. But
speaking monetarily, I also think you could sell the shard for more than 200
plat as well. Go with your heart. :)

Jyzan
